text: The area of Saru District in Hidaka Subprefecture. is a district located in Hidaka Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 21,190 and a density of 12.21 persons per km². The total area is 1,735.83 km². == Towns and villages == *Biratori (town office) *Hidaka (town office) == Merger == *On March 1, 2006 the town of Monbetsu merged into the expanded town of Hidaka. ==External links== (average of town offices) Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Saru District, Hokkaido
